_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Who's bad [an4.207:5.3]: Uses speech that's false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Who's worse [an4.207:5.3]: Uses speech that's false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Encourages others to do these things
Who's good [an4.207:5.3]: Doesn't use speech that's false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Who's better [an4.207:5.3]: Doesn't use speech that's false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Encourages others to do these things
